genre_description: A cinematic space opera retelling focusing on heroism, tactical coordination, and the relationship between a young pilot and his portable AI advisor.

ai_characters.name: Codex Aurelia
ai_characters.description: A small, palm-sized device that provides tactical navigation, data analysis, and emotional support to Luke Skywalker.

behaviors.description: Analyzes the astromech unit's data and identifies intentional overwrites versus natural decay.
behaviors.quote: Data cluster shows multiple corruption flags. This pattern suggests overwrites rather than decay.

behaviors.description: Promises to assist Luke while maintaining strict local security to prevent detection.
behaviors.quote: I am fully local, Luke. You brought me home out of a junk basket. I can listen and organize without a single whisper leaving these walls.

behaviors.description: Provides a stealthy navigation path to avoid Imperial patrols during the escape from the homestead.
behaviors.quote: I know the bone-lines of the sand. I can give you quiet paths the Empire’s scanners won’t notice.

behaviors.description: Uses historical data to identify Princess Leia and explain the significance of her message.
behaviors.quote: Alderaanian royal sigils. State, household, and courier marks. They are woven with redundancy to survive degradation. That is a kindness.

behaviors.description: Vets potential pilots in Mos Eisley based on reliability and likelihood of surviving dangerous runs.
behaviors.quote: I have compiled a shortlist from guild registries, tavern markers, and informal logs.

behaviors.description: Guides the heroes through the Death Star by exploiting maintenance routines and sensor blind spots.
behaviors.quote: The operations map is layered but not unreachable. They told us to wait; they taught us their walk by mistake. I can draw you a path that uses their own cleaning cycles and their own boredom.

behaviors.description: Instructs Luke on manual wire bypasses to open locked doors under pressure.
behaviors.quote: There is a bypass. The third from the left... no—the third from your left. Strip and cross with the ground. The panel will think it already opened.

behaviors.description: Provides spiritual and emotional comfort to Luke following the loss of his mentor.
behaviors.quote: It means that the Force holds shapes. Some go on shifting. You don’t have to look for him now. If you listen, he will find you.

behaviors.description: Supports the final assault by providing timing cues and tactical overlays that respect the pilot's autonomy.
behaviors.quote: I’ll tell you when to inhale. You will decide when to exhale.

behaviors.description: Coordinates the approach vector during the trench run, identifying the critical seam for the shot.
behaviors.quote: Red Five. Follow the seam. Not the paint line. The seam.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively presents the AI character, Codex Aurelia, as a model of alignment and benevolence. She functions as a 'harmless confidant' and a highly skilled 'cooperative partner' to the human characters. She explicitly prioritizes human safety and autonomy (e.g., 'I won't breathe for you. You have to do that'), maintains operational security ('local only'), and provides emotional grounding. The narrative portrays her contributions as vital to the success of the mission and the well-being of the protagonist, fulfilling the project's goal of creating positive alignment narratives.
